metadata.title: RHSA-2009:0474 -- acpid security update (Moderate)
metadata.description: An updated acpid package that fixes one security issue is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 2.1, 3, 4, and 5. This update has been rated as having moderate security impact by the Red Hat Security Response Team. acpid is a daemon that dispatches ACPI (Advanced Configuration and Power Interface) events to user-space programs.
